content.title: Important News on K7 Crowdfunding Campaign!
content.creator:
Fosi Audio
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Hello Backers,

We are excited to announce that our K7 crowdfunding project has ended on Kickstarter with great success! We couldn't have done it without your generous support and enthusiasm. Thank you so much for believing in us. 
Important Step for Backers
To ensure a smooth shipping process, We will ask all backers to complete the survey :
‚ÜíHow to find the survey?
Confirm Your Shipping Information: confirm your Name, shipping address, phone number, and email address. This information is essential for us to communicate with you about the status of your reward, shipping details, and any other updates.
Shipping Begins around 15th March: we will ship out K7 around 15th March. Backers will receive an email with tracking information once their order has been shipped.
Kickstarter Late Pledge Option
For those who have missed the K7 Kickstarter campaign, we have good news!
Our Kickstarter Late Pledge is still in progress. Welcome everyone to continue to join now. Don't miss this opportunity. 
If your pledge is declined, please check the link below for help:
https://help.kickstarter.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005133293-A-project-I-m-backing-just-succeeded-but-my-pledge-was-declined-What-do-I-need-to-do-next

If you have any questions, feel free to leave your comments and contact us!

Support email: marketing@fosiaudio.com

Don‚Äôt forget to join our Facebook& Discord Community for future updates:

Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1601599234085206
Discord community: https://discord.com/channels/1316655652260548658/1319214127704571986


Best regards,
Fosi Audio Team

I feel like a kid on Christmas. Thank you guys for your hard work and congrats on the crowdfunding.

content.title: Gaming Headset or HiFi Headphones + DAC/Amp? Fosi Audio K7, the Ultimate Audio Dilemma Solution!
content.creator:
Fosi Audio
February 5, 2025
content.content:
If you're a gamer who also loves high-quality audio, you've probably faced this question:
üëâ Should I buy a gaming headset for convenience or invest in audiophile headphones with a DAC/Amp for better sound quality?
Each choice comes with trade-offs:
√ó Gaming Headsets ‚Äì Feature built-in mics, wireless connectivity, and low-latency gaming sound, but often compromise on audio fidelity.
√ó Audiophile Headphones + DAC/Amp ‚Äì Deliver superior sound quality and immersive HiFi audio, but lack gaming-focused features like precise positional sound tuning and built-in communication tools.
So, why choose one when you can have both?

Fosi Audio K7 is designed to bridge the gap between gaming and HiFi audio, combining the best of both worlds in a single device.
‚úÖ Low-latency, precise positional audio for FPS and competitive gaming
‚úÖ HiFi-grade sound quality with high-resolution audio decoding
‚úÖ Powerful output to drive both gaming headsets and audiophile headphones
‚úÖ Versatile connectivity ‚Äì Supports USB, optical, and Bluetooth input options
Whether you‚Äôre competing in intense battles or immersing yourself in music and movies, the Fosi Audio K7 adapts to your needs, making it the ultimate all-in-one audio solution.
üîó Get your K7 now before the campaign ends!
Would you choose gaming headsets or audiophile headphones? Now, you don‚Äôt have to decide! 
Let us know your thoughts in the comments!!!

comments.text: Looking soooooooooooo forward to it! And it`s not far away anymore ü•∞...hopefully ü§û

content.title: A Big Thank You + Exciting Industry News!
content.creator:
Fosi Audio
January 17, 2025
content.content:
Dear K7 Backers,  
Thank you all for your incredible support! We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that our project reached its funding goal in just 1 hour! This achievement wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without your enthusiasm and trust. With 38 days remaining, we hope you‚Äôll continue to follow our journey, share your thoughts, and help us spread the word about K7.

Meet the HIDIZS ST2 PRO ‚Äì The USB-C HiFi IEMs-DAC Combo Perfect for On-the-Go Premium Sound
On another note, as a brand committed to advancing the audio industry, we'd like to take a moment to recommendHidiZS ST2 Pro. We believe in collaboration and mutual growth, and HlDlZS shares our vision for delivering exceptional audio products.
Suppose you want to upgrade your Hi-Res instant music journey without bulky or complicated devices. This all-in-one lEMs-DAC combo is perfect for on-the-go HiFi sound, no charging, no disconnects, just seamless plug-and-play convenience. Compatible with USB-C devices, including the iPhone 15/16 series, for instant HiFi audio.
Enjoy rich bass, detailed mids, and clear highs across 20Hz to 40kHz‚Äîall in a premium Hi-res audio, comfortable fit
